script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Our next act is a Google Data Engineer from London, originally from Italy! He claims he has a foolproof plan to win Sara's heart tonight. Please welcome, Andrea, performing a very special rendition of 'Somebody to Love'!

script.speaker: Participant
script.text: START PERFORMANCE - Andrea performs his acoustic rendition of 'Somebody to Love', with the 'find some data to flow' twist, glancing at Sara throughout.

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: Okay, Andrea! You weren't wrong, 'Somebody to Love' is definitely up there. Bold move changing the lyrics in front of Dave and me though!

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: Yeah, man! You gotta respect the classics! But hey, 'find some data to flow'? Pretty clever for a data engineer.  Gotta give you that!

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: Andrea, your voice has a really nice, raw quality to it. And the way you were looking at Sara... there's definitely some emotion there! Raw and real, I like it.

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: Well, Andrea, you certainly have good taste in music! That was very sweet.  And for the record, I appreciate a good data flow as much as the next person.

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: So, Andrea, did you find the data to flow into Sara's heart? Judges, let's hear those votes!

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: I dig the dedication, and the data flow line was pretty funny. It's a yes from me!

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: You took a risk, man, and that's what this is all about. Plus, anyone who loves Queen can't be all bad. It's a yes!

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: I felt your sincerity, Andrea, and that's what matters most. It's a yes.

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: Andrea, you've got a great voice and a charming personality. It's a yes, but no promises about that date!  Let's see how your data analysis skills are in the next round.

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Four yeses, Andrea! Looks like your data flow analysis paid off. Congratulations, you're moving on to the next round!
